author: Special Correspondent
text:
Department of Public Health officials and medical professionals are camping in Perugavazhandan area of Tiruvarur district for the past three days and working to stem the spread of diarrhoea in the region.

Anjammal (65) of North Street of Devadanam village near Perugavazhandan area in Tiruvarur district died of diarrhoea after being treated at the Tiruthuraipoondi GH on Sunday. Twenty four persons were treated for similar ailments at the hospitals.

The officials are trying to find the reason for stomach related ailment of the people.
title: Woman dies of diarrhoea
